column3: Latest;Banteay Meanchey: According to CMAC officials
column4: a large collection of UXOs were found on June 10
column9: Banteay Meanchey province.------A family had collected landmines and other various explosive remnants of war to keep at their home. Some were even placed hanging intrees as decoration.Almost 30 separate pieces of ordnance were discovered
column10: and most were still live.------The homeowner was educated on the use and storage of landmines and the law of keeping explosives. (Photos: Heng Ratana)
